00013 void Joystick_Init(void){
00014         int button[10] = {L1,L2,R1,R2,B1,B2,B3,B4,BL,BR};
00015         int analog[4] = {RY,RX,LY,LX};
00016         int channel;
00017         int i;
00018         for ( i = 0; i < 10; i ++){
00019                 //port = button[i] / 100;
00020                 //channel = button[i] % 100;
00021                 GPIO_Init(button[i],INPUT);
00022         }
00023         for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++){
00024                 channel = analog[i] % 10;
00025                 ADC_InitChannel(channel);
00026         }
00027         return ;
00028 }

00036 int Joystick_ReadAxis(int channel){
00037         return ADC_Read(channel);
00038 } 
00039 
00046 int Joystick_ReadButton(int channel){
00047         return (GPIO_Read(channel) + 1) % 2;
00048 }
